  physical_appearance: The image shows a colour photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of soldiers standing around and looking at some things on the ground. At the left hand side of the photograph
 a soldier wearing shorts without any upperwear is carrying the things from the ground on a metal tray and walking away from the rest. Another soldier seems to be interacting with one of the labourers who is holding a spade
 at the left hand side of the photograph. The right hand side of the photograph shows a double storey roofed building in the background.

metadata.title_text: Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire) Soldiers Looking at Things on the Ground
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a colour photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of soldiers standing around and looking at some things on the ground. At the left hand side of the photograph, a soldier wearing shorts without any upperwear is carrying the things from the ground on a metal tray and walking away from the rest. Another soldier seems to be interacting with one of the labourers who is holding a spade, at the left hand side of the photograph. The right hand side of the photograph shows a double storey roofed building in the background.
